title: Ruth Jones exudes glamour in a billowing scarlet gown as she poses up a storm in stunning photoshoot
text:
She recently revealed that the Gavin and Stacey Christmas special is 'in the can' and ready to go.

Yet Ruth Jones proved she was keeping busy during the downtime as she was seen posing for a stunning photoshoot in Hyde Park, London on Tuesday.

The stunning actress, 53, looked radiant in a billowing scarlet gown as she posed up a storm on a bridge over The Serpentine lake.

Still hard at work: Ruth Jones proved she was keeping busy as she was seen posing for a stunning photoshoot in Hyde Park, London on Tuesday

Ruth's eye-catching gown featured a plunging shirt style neckline and cinched in around her waist with a sash.

Flaring out into a full length skirt, the garment grazed the floor, with Ruth revealing that she was wearing a pair of comfy trainers beneath.

Ruth completed the look by donning ornate gold chandelier earrings that peeked out beneath her bouncy blow dry.

Radiant: The stunning actress, 53, looked radiant in a billowing scarlet gown as she posed up a storm on a bridge over The Serpentine lake

Ravishing in red: Ruth's eye-catching gown featured a plunging shirt style neckline and cinched in around her waist with a sash

The glamorous shoot comes after Ruth delighted fans by announcing the Gavin and Stacey special is all set to air on Christmas Day.

Ruth, who played Nessa Jenkins in the hit BBC series, told BBC Wales: 'It's all done and dusted, kippers and custard! It's in the can, as they say.

'It was really good fun, it was a very smooth shoot. It was gorgeous to see everybody again.'

Stepping out in style: Flaring out into a full length skirt, the garment grazed the floor, with Ruth revealing that she was wearing a pair of comfy trainers beneath

Brunette bombshell! Ruth completed the look by donning ornate gold chandelier earrings that peeked out beneath her bouncy blow dry

The Gavin and Stacey special sees James back as Neil 'Smithy' Smith and Mathew Horne and Joanna Page reprise their respective titular roles as married couple Gavin and Stacey Shipman.

They are joined by returning cast members Rob Brydon, Larry Lamb, Melanie Walters and Alison Steadman

Although details of the storyline for the special are being kept under wraps, Larry - who plays Gavin's dad Mick Shipman in the show - has promised fans they will get 'everything they want' from the reunion.
